channel.title: VPS/Server (rep++)
channel.description:
Well, i'm running my server in my 64bit 2003 VPS, when I first turned my pc off and clicked the cross on the VPS, everyone dissconnected, then when I looked at the run.bat I got this error;
[URL=http://img153.imageshack.us/i/helpb.png/][IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/2029/helpb.png[/img][/URL]
Then when I do the same again, but then it says error connecting to server, when the server is suppose to stay on whilst my pc off?
-Maybe the VPS turns server off because my DUC settings are wrong or something.
-HELP? REP++

item.title: VPS/Server (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

You ran out of memory, it used to much Ram. Add me - kmunoz789@hotmail.com I’ll tell you how & what to do.

Your server has memory leaks.

I Vain I:

Install 32bit JRE on it.

He has a 64bit, I looked at it. But with 512mb of ram with a server + memory leaks in it not a good combo.

Read full topic
